backend/main.mo: Main backend canister managing user profiles, plans, permissions, and audio metadata with admin/user access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin error-handling requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all frontend files describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React root with the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, route guards for users/admins, and global toaster and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Admin dashboard sidebar with navigation links, branding, and logout behavior tied to admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing a full-page neon grid background behind all page content.
UI card for selecting, validating, and uploading audio files with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Modal providing user and admin login flows using Internet Identity with error handling and navigation.
frontend/src/components/AuthorizationErr: Reusable component displaying formatted authorization errors with details, copy-to-clipboard, and optional retry.
Static marketing section listing product features with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation bar handling login/logout, admin session state, and account menu actions.
frontend/src/components/MyAudioList.tsx: Displays a user's uploaded audio files with playback, delete confirmation, and Mix & Master navigation.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders a pricing section with multiple subscription plans and triggers auth on plan selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for new users to enter a name and saves an initial free-profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ToolLauncher.tsx: Shows available music tools and restricts access based on plan levels, with navigation and upgrade prompts.
Presents plan upgrade options, handles upgrade actions, and shows special states for admin or full-plan users.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Admin table for viewing users, editing their plans, and updating profiles through mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminData.ts: Provides admin queries and mutations for fetching user statistics, all user profiles, and updating user plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages a simple admin session using a hardcoded password and sessionStorage with login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLibrary.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, add, and delete user audio files via actor calls with React Query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile, handling actor readiness and query state.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportUsage.ts: Tracks export usage, bypassing backend calls for admins and refreshing the user profile on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlan.ts: Updates a user's plan by modifying their profile and recalculating export limits before saving.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, theming, and custom glass panel styling.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessing.ts: Contains audio processing utilities using Web Audio API and WAV export helpers.
frontend/src/lib/planUtils.ts: Provides display utilities for plan types and determines effective plan based on admin session.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard, requiring admin session and identity login while fetching stats and user data with auto-refresh.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, calls to action, and sections for features, pricing, and authentication modal.
frontend/src/pages/MixMasterPage.tsx: Audio mixing page that loads user audio, provides EQ and gain controls, and supports playback and exporting.
frontend/src/pages/MyAudioPage.tsx: Displays user audio library with upload support, handling authentication and error states.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing profile, plan info, tools, and error handling for profile loading.
frontend/src/utils/authzErrors.ts: Parses backend authorization errors and maps them to user-friendly structured messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, container settings, extensive OKLCH color system, and custom radius/shadow extensions.
project_state.json: Project state describing platform goals, architecture notes, known issues with login/admin flows, and a list of existing feature definitions.
